verses.verse: בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> bai-ya-Mim In those days הָהֵ֔ם <WH1992> ha-Hem, those חָלָ֥ה <WH2470> cha-Lah sick חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH2396> chiz-ki-Ya-hu was Hezekiah לָמ֑וּת <WH4191> la-Mut; unto death וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo came אֵ֠לָיו <WH413> 'E-lav and יְשַׁעְיָ֨הוּ <WH3470> ye-sha'-Ya-hu Isaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son אָמ֜וֹץ <WH531> a-Motz of Amoz הַנָּבִ֗יא <WH5030> han-na-Vi, And the prophet וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer to him and said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> 'e-Lav to him כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> 'a-Mar unto him Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צַ֣ו <WH6680> tzav in order לְבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> le-vei-Te-cha, Set thine house כִּ֛י <WH3588> ki for מֵ֥ת <WH4191> met for thou shalt die אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo and not תִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <WH2421> Tich-Yeh. and not live

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> vay-Hi came יְשַׁעְיָ֔הוּ <WH3470> ye-sha'-Ya-hu, And it came to pass afore Isaiah לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo Before יָצָ֔א <WH3318> ya-Tza, was gone out; הָעִיר ha-'ir כחָצֵ֖ר <WH5892> cha-Tzer Ai קהַתִּֽיכֹנָ֑ה <WH8484> hat-ti-cho-Nah; into the middle וּדְבַר־ <WH1697> u-de-var- that the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ha-Yah came אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> 'e-Lav to him לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came to him saying

וְהֹסַפְתִּ֣י <WH3254> ve-ho-saf-Ti And I will add עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto יָמֶ֗יךָ <WH3117> ya-Mei-cha, unto thy days חֲמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh fif עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> 'es-Reh teen שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years וּמִכַּ֤ף <WH3709> u-mik-Kaf out of the hand מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- of the king אַשּׁוּר֙ <WH804> 'ash-Shur of Assyria אַצִּ֣ילְךָ֔ <WH5337> 'atz-Tzi-le-cha, and I will deliver וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir thee and this city הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> haz-Zot; and I וְגַנּוֹתִי֙ <WH1598> ve-gan-no-Ti and I will defend עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> haz-Zot, my own לְמַֽעֲנִ֔י <WH4616> le-ma-'a-Ni, sake וּלְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> u-le-Ma-'an sake דָּוִ֥ד <WH1732> da-Vid David's עַבְדִּֽי׃ <WH5650> 'av-Di. for mine own sake and for my servant

[even] from Babylon
